name: Ninja Unicorn
description:
Ninja Unicorn is the pinnacle of unicorn games! It has interactive surprises through out the entire game! You must save Princess Unicorn from the evil UniNapper! Explore through each level and master your skills.

Mechanics:

Press D to move.

Press Space or Jump button to jump.

Pass the level.

Avoid projectiles.

Download on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.THStudios.NinjaUnicorn&rdid=co...

IOS coming soon!
